name: the tilda shrug
notes:
description:
introducing the tilda shrug- a chic and cozy piece that effortlessly marries style and comfort. the oversized comfy sleeves seamlessly merge with the shrug, creating a fashion-forward silhouette. elevate your crochet skills with fun shaping techniques and the charming stitch detail down the back. as an added bonus, the pattern includes an easy-to-follow video tutorial, ensuring a delightful crafting experience for all skill levels.

[the tilda shrug is a free crochet pattern on my blog!][1]

[a kit for the tilda shrug is available with lion brand!][2] the kit comes with all the yarn to make the shrug plus a free copy of the pdf digital download pattern!

[a full video tutorial is available for the tilda shrug on my youtube chanel!][3]


  [1]: https://www.eandpcrochet.com/the-tilda-shrug-crochet-pattern/
  [2]: http://shrsl.com/4er3g
  [3]: https://youtu.be/yd7cohtgpt8
